name: sampler
description: Generates quasi-probabilities by sampling quantum circuits.

circuits.description: A single or list of QuantumCircuits.

circuits_indices.description: Indexes of the circuits to evaluate.

transpile_options.description: A collection of kwargs passed to transpile. Ignored if skip_transpilation is set to True.

run_options.description: A collection of kwargs passed to backend.run.

skip_transpilation.description: Skip circuit transpilation. Default is False.

quasi_dists.description: List of quasi-probabilities returned for each circuit.
